price: 112. Alobi: Nkolo kata na bosembo bonso. Mpe Nkolo wa biso Ar- Rahmán(1) ye nde mosalisi likolo ya maye balobelaka.
arabic: قَٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ
footnotes: 1 Ar-Rahmân: Bótala na suratu Maryam mokapo: 61.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi uḥ'kum bil-ḥaqi warabbunā al-raḥmānu al-mus'taʿānu ʿalā mā taṣifūna
translations: the One Whose help is sought
